summary: Farhaad Riyaz, M.D., had his medical license revoked by the Maryland State Board of Physicians after pleading guilty to one count of Mail Fraud. Dr. Riyaz defrauded Amazon of over $250,000 by executing a scheme of false returns, claiming products were not received or returning cheaper substitutes. His license was revoked as the conviction was deemed a crime involving moral turpitude, mandating such action by the Board.
